    WHEN lims['memory'] ENDS WITH 'M' THEN toFloat(replace(lims['memory'], 'M', ''))
    WHEN lims['memory'] ENDS WITH 'k' THEN toFloat(replace(lims['memory'], 'k', '')) / 1024
    WHEN lims['memory'] IS NOT NULL THEN toFloat(lims['memory']) / 1024 / 1024

    WHEN lims['memory'] ENDS WITH 'Gi' THEN toFloat(replace(lims['memory'], 'Gi', '')) * 1024
    WHEN lims['memory'] ENDS WITH 'Mi' THEN toFloat(replace(lims['memory'], 'Mi', ''))
    WHEN lims['memory'] ENDS WITH 'Ki' THEN toFloat(replace(lims['memory'], 'Ki', '')) / 1024
    WHEN lims['memory'] ENDS WITH 'M' THEN toFloat(replace(lims['memory'], 'M', ''))
    WHEN lims['memory'] ENDS WITH 'k' THEN toFloat(replace(lims['memory'], 'k', '')) / 1024
    WHEN lims['memory'] IS NOT NULL THEN toFloat(lims['memory']) / 1024 / 1024
    ELSE 0
  END AS lim_memory_mib,
  CASE
    WHEN reqs['memory'] ENDS WITH 'Ti' THEN toFloat(replace(reqs['memory'], 'Ti', '')) * 1024 * 1024
    WHEN reqs['memory'] ENDS WITH 'Gi' THEN toFloat(replace(reqs['memory'], 'Gi', '')) * 1024
    WHEN reqs['memory'] ENDS WITH 'Mi' THEN toFloat(replace(reqs['memory'], 'Mi', ''))

    WHEN reqs['memory'] ENDS WITH 'k' THEN toFloat(replace(reqs['memory'], 'k', '')) / 1024
    WHEN reqs['memory'] IS NOT NULL THEN toFloat(reqs['memory']) / 1024 / 1024
    ELSE 0
  END AS req_memory_mib

MATCH (ns:Namespace)<-[:BelongsTo]-(p:Pod)
UNWIND p['spec']['containers'] AS container
WITH ns, container['resources']['requests'] AS reqs, container['resources']['limits'] AS lims
WITH ns, reqs, lims,
  CASE
    WHEN lims['memory'] ENDS WITH 'Ti' THEN toFloat(replace(lims['memory'], 'Ti', '')) * 1024 * 1024
    WHEN lims['memory'] ENDS WITH 'Gi' THEN toFloat(replace(lims['memory'], 'Gi', '')) * 1024
    WHEN lims['memory'] ENDS WITH 'Mi' THEN toFloat(replace(lims['memory'], 'Mi', ''))
    WHEN lims['memory'] ENDS WITH 'Ki' THEN toFloat(replace(lims['memory'], 'Ki', '')) / 1024
    WHEN lims['memory'] ENDS WITH 'M' THEN toFloat(replace(lims['memory'], 'M', ''))
    WHEN lims['memory'] ENDS WITH 'k' THEN toFloat(replace(lims['memory'], 'k', '')) / 1024
    WHEN lims['memory'] IS NOT NULL THEN toFloat(lims['memory']) / 1024 / 1024
    ELSE 0
  END AS lim_memory_mib,
  CASE
    WHEN reqs['memory'] ENDS WITH 'Ti' THEN toFloat(replace(reqs['memory'], 'Ti', '')) * 1024 * 1024
    WHEN reqs['memory'] ENDS WITH 'Gi' THEN toFloat(replace(reqs['memory'], 'Gi', '')) * 1024
    WHEN reqs['memory'] ENDS WITH 'Mi' THEN toFloat(replace(reqs['memory'], 'Mi', ''))
    WHEN reqs['memory'] ENDS WITH 'Ki' THEN toFloat(replace(reqs['memory'], 'Ki', '')) / 1024
    WHEN reqs['memory'] ENDS WITH 'M' THEN toFloat(replace(reqs['memory'], 'M', ''))
    WHEN reqs['memory'] ENDS WITH 'k' THEN toFloat(replace(reqs['memory'], 'k', '')) / 1024
    WHEN reqs['memory'] IS NOT NULL THEN toFloat(reqs['memory']) / 1024 / 1024
    ELSE 0
  END AS req_memory_mib
RETURN ns['metadata']['name'] AS namespace,
  SUM(req_memory_mib) AS total_requested_memory_mib,
  SUM(lim_memory_mib) AS total_limit_memory_mib
ORDER BY namespace
